title: any tips of chem , EPD for ISA 1? (eg: where questions come from)

comments.body:
the notes on PESU academy are pretty decent , also , the slides on discord , the old ones (2021 ig) were pretty good and have detailed info in the form of annotations and stuff by the course instructor .

These along with NESO academy got me an S in EPD .

(Sanket sirs notes are overrated , instead try to find these slides that im talking about on discord , they are the older slides NOTE , but have good content ).

Notes on pesuacademy + slides. Then on the day of exam attempt the mcqs. That was enough for answering mcqs in our isas. But since your batch has even descriptive questions I wud suggest going through the prescribed textbook once as they've explain some of those big concepts very nicely.
Where can we find notes on discord
